page.title: 12LIFE IN FELTHAM
page.content: Feltham has a good shopping centre where you can buy just about anything that you want. At the centre there is a Tesco's and Sainsbury'S which get very busy on thursdays,fridays and saturdays. There is also a Wimpy hamburger restaurant where I go whem my mam goes to do her shopping. There is also a good toy and model shop which I like to have alook in and then there is the library which has a lot of computer games that you can play. P.C. Frazer is the local police officer and he comes into our school to talk to us. There are plenty of places to play games in Feltham especially the parks with their swings and football pitches. There is a lot of building going on and maybe by the year 2000 Feltham will be a city.
